TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Rfc2898DeriveBytes extends System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes

summary.span: 通过使用基于 的伪随机数生成器，实现基于密码的密钥派生功能 (PBKDF2)。

span.span: Implements password-based key derivation functionality, PBKDF2, by using a pseudo-random number generator based on .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取密码、salt 和迭代次数, 然后通过调用方法来生成密钥。 takes a password, a salt, and an iteration count, and then generates keys through calls to the method. RFC 2898 包含用于从密码和 salt 创建密钥和初始化向量 (IV) 的方法。RFC 2898 includes methods for creating a key and initialization vector (IV) from a password and salt. 可以使用 PBKDF2, 基于密码的密钥派生函数, 通过伪随机函数派生密钥, 该函数允许生成几乎不受限制的键。You can use PBKDF2, a password-based key derivation function, to derive keys using a pseudo-random function that allows keys of virtually unlimited length to be generated. 类可用于从基本键和其他参数生成派生密钥。The class can be used to produce a derived key from a base key and other parameters. 在基于密码的密钥派生函数中, 基本密钥是密码, 而其他参数是 salt 值和迭代次数。In a password-based key derivation function, the base key is a password and the other parameters are a salt value and an iteration count. 有关 PBKDF2 的详细信息, 请参阅 RFC 2898 "PKCS #5:基于密码的加密规范版本 2.0, "在[征求意见文档网站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119)上可用"。For more information about PBKDF2, see RFC 2898, "PKCS #5: Password-Based Cryptography Specification Version 2.0," available on the [Request for Comments Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119). 有关完整的详细信息, 请参阅5.2 节的 "PBKDF2"。See section 5.2, "PBKDF2," for complete details. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不要在源代码中对密码进行硬编码。Never hard-code a password within your source code. 可以通过使用[Ildasm (IL 拆装器)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)、使用十六进制编辑器或只是在文本编辑器 (例如 notepad.exe) 中打开程序集来检索硬编码的密码。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly by using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), by using a hexadecimal editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类为类创建两个相同的键。The following code example uses the class to create two identical keys for the class. 然后, 使用密钥对某些数据进行加密和解密。It then encrypts and decrypts some data using the keys. [!code-cpp[rfc28981#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CPP/rfc28981.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[rfc28981#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CS/rfc28981.cs#1)] [!code-vb[rfc28981#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/vb/rfc28981.vb#1)]

summary.span: 通过使用密码和 salt 值派生密钥，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using a password and salt to derive the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Salt 大小必须大于或等于8字节。The salt size must be 8 bytes or larger. RFC 2898 包含用于从密码和 salt 创建密钥和初始化向量 (IV) 的方法。RFC 2898 includes methods for creating a key and initialization vector (IV) from a password and salt. 可以使用 PBKDF2, 基于密码的密钥派生函数, 通过伪随机函数派生密钥, 该函数允许生成几乎不受限制的键。You can use PBKDF2, a password-based key derivation function, to derive keys using a pseudo-random function that allows keys of virtually unlimited length to be generated. 类可用于从基本键和其他参数生成派生密钥。The class can be used to produce a derived key from a base key and other parameters. 在基于密码的密钥派生函数中, 基本密钥是密码, 而其他参数是 salt 值和迭代次数。In a password-based key derivation function, the base key is a password and the other parameters are a salt value and an iteration count. 有关 PBKDF2 的详细信息, 请参阅 RFC 2898 "PKCS #5:基于密码的加密规范版本 2.0, "在[征求意见文档网站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119)上可用"。For more information about PBKDF2, see RFC 2898, "PKCS #5: Password-Based Cryptography Specification Version 2.0," available on the [Request for Comments Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119). 有关完整的详细信息, 请参阅5.2 节的 "PBKDF2"。See section 5.2, "PBKDF2," for complete details. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不要在源代码中对密码进行硬编码。Never hard-code a password within your source code. 可以通过使用[Ildasm (IL 拆装器)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)、使用十六进制编辑器或只是在文本编辑器 (例如 notepad.exe) 中打开程序集来检索硬编码的密码。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly by using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), by using a hexadecimal editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类为类创建两个相同的键。The following code example uses the class to create two identical keys for the class. 然后, 使用密钥对某些数据进行加密和解密。It then encrypts and decrypts some data using the keys. [!code-cpp[rfc28981#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CPP/rfc28981.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[rfc28981#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CS/rfc28981.cs#1)] [!code-vb[rfc28981#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/vb/rfc28981.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指定的 salt 大小小于 8 字节或迭代次数小于 1。

span.span: The specified salt size is smaller than 8 bytes or the iteration count is less than 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Salt 大小必须大于或等于8字节。The salt size must be 8 bytes or larger. RFC 2898 包含用于从密码和 salt 创建密钥和初始化向量 (IV) 的方法。RFC 2898 includes methods for creating a key and initialization vector (IV) from a password and salt. 可以使用 PBKDF2, 基于密码的密钥派生函数, 通过伪随机函数派生密钥, 该函数允许生成几乎不受限制的键。You can use PBKDF2, a password-based key derivation function, to derive keys using a pseudo-random function that allows keys of virtually unlimited length to be generated. 类可用于从基本键和其他参数生成派生密钥。The class can be used to produce a derived key from a base key and other parameters. 在基于密码的密钥派生函数中, 基本密钥是密码, 而其他参数是 salt 值和迭代次数。In a password-based key derivation function, the base key is a password and the other parameters are a salt value and an iteration count. 有关 PBKDF2 的详细信息, 请参阅 RFC 2898 "PKCS #5:基于密码的加密规范版本 2.0, "在[征求意见文档网站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119)上可用"。For more information about PBKDF2, see RFC 2898, "PKCS #5: Password-Based Cryptography Specification Version 2.0," available on the [Request for Comments Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119). 有关完整的详细信息, 请参阅5.2 节的 "PBKDF2"。See section 5.2, "PBKDF2," for complete details. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不要在源代码中对密码进行硬编码。Never hard-code a password within your source code. 可以通过使用[Ildasm (IL 拆装器)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)、使用十六进制编辑器或只是在文本编辑器 (例如 notepad.exe) 中打开程序集来检索硬编码的密码。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly by using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), by using a hexadecimal editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using a password, a salt, and number of iterations to derive the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Salt 大小必须为8个字节或更大, 并且迭代计数必须大于零。The salt size must be 8 bytes or larger and the iteration count must be greater than zero. 建议的最小迭代次数为1000。The minimum recommended number of iterations is 1000. RFC 2898 包含用于从密码和 salt 创建密钥和初始化向量 (IV) 的方法。RFC 2898 includes methods for creating a key and initialization vector (IV) from a password and salt. 可以使用 PBKDF2, 基于密码的密钥派生函数, 通过伪随机函数派生密钥, 该函数允许生成几乎不受限制的键。You can use PBKDF2, a password-based key derivation function, to derive keys using a pseudo-random function that allows keys of virtually unlimited length to be generated. 类可用于从基本键和其他参数生成派生密钥。The class can be used to produce a derived key from a base key and other parameters. 在基于密码的密钥派生函数中, 基本密钥是密码, 而其他参数是 salt 值和迭代次数。In a password-based key derivation function, the base key is a password and the other parameters are a salt value and an iteration count. 有关 PBKDF2 的详细信息, 请参阅 RFC 2898 "PKCS #5:基于密码的加密规范版本 2.0, "在[征求意见文档网站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119)上可用"。For more information about PBKDF2, see RFC 2898, "PKCS #5: Password-Based Cryptography Specification Version 2.0," available on the [Request for Comments Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37119). 有关完整的详细信息, 请参阅5.2 节的 "PBKDF2"。See section 5.2, "PBKDF2," for complete details. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不要在源代码中对密码进行硬编码。Never hard-code a password within your source code. 可以通过使用[Ildasm (IL 拆装器)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)、使用十六进制编辑器或只是在文本编辑器 (例如 notepad.exe) 中打开程序集来检索硬编码的密码。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly by using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), by using a hexadecimal editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此函数是加密 API 函数 CryptDeriveKey () 的包装器, 旨在提供使用加密 API 与应用程序的互操作性。This function is a wrapper for the Crypto API function CryptDeriveKey(), and is intended to offer interoperability with applications using the Crypto API. 如果将`keySize`参数设置为0位, 则使用指定算法的默认密钥大小。If the `keySize` parameter is set to 0 bits, the default key size for the specified algorithm is used.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);
override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示释放托管资源和非托管资源； 表示仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 类使用的非托管资源，并可以选择释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法`Finalize`和方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`的方法, `disposing`并将参数`true`设置为。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Finalize`在`Dispose` 设置`disposing` 为`false`的情况调用。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时, 请注意不要引用先前在调用时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息, 请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关 和的详细信息, 请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类通过使用基于的伪随机数生成器来实现 PBKDF2 功能。 The class implements PBKDF2 functionality by using a pseudorandom number generator based on . 类采用密码、salt 和迭代次数, 然后通过调用方法来生成密钥。 The class takes a password, a salt, and an iteration count, and then generates keys through calls to the method. 对此方法的重复调用将不生成相同的键;相反 , `40` `cb` `20`使用参数值附加方法的两个调用是等效于使用参数值调用方法一次。 `cb`Repeated calls to this method will not generate the same key; instead, appending two calls of the method with a `cb` parameter value of `20` is the equivalent of calling the method once with a `cb` parameter value of `40`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法获取实例的键。The following example shows how to use the method to get the key for an instance of . 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[rfc28981#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CPP/rfc28981.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[rfc28981#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/CS/rfc28981.cs#2)] [!code-vb[rfc28981#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/rfc28981/vb/rfc28981.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 迭代次数是执行操作的次数。Iteration count is the number of times an operation is performed. 对于此方法, 计数应大于零。For this method, the count should be greater than zero. 建议的最小迭代次数为1000。The minimum recommended number of iterations is 1000. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来显示生成密钥时使用的迭代次数。The following example shows how to use the property to display the number of iterations used in the generation of the key. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置操作的密钥 salt 值。

span.span: Gets or sets the key salt value for the operation.

value.span: 操作的密钥 salt 值。

span.span: The key salt value for the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Salt (一组随机字节) 用于使邮件的未经授权解密更难。Salt, a random set of bytes, is used to make unauthorized decrypting of a message more difficult. 字典攻击是一种攻击, 攻击者通过将加密的值与以前计算的加密值 (最可能的密钥) 进行比较来尝试解密加密的消息。A dictionary attack is an attack in which the attacker attempts to decrypt an encrypted message by comparing the encrypted value with previously computed encrypted values for the most likely keys. 在密钥派生之前, 在密码末尾引入盐或随机字节, 这种攻击的难度更大。This attack is made much more difficult by the introduction of salt, or random bytes, at the end of the password before the key derivation.

exception.span: 指定的 salt 大小小于 8 字节。

span.span: The specified salt size is smaller than 8 bytes.
The salt is .
